Posts.EditableText:
Due to the bug or whatever in 4.04 that happens if a game uses capital letters in item names, I can't seem to be able to play some games. Could anyone direct me to a link where I can download a previous version of the runner that allows for such games to run? I hear 4.03 can do it.

Much obliged!
Posts.HTML:
Due to the bug or whatever in 4.04 that happens if a game uses capital letters in item names, I can't seem to be able to play some games. Could anyone direct me to a link where I can download a previous version of the runner that allows for such games to run? I hear 4.03 can do it.

Much obliged!

Posts.EditableText: Yes, this update sucks. The answer - use lower case letters, and use alias'.
Posts.HTML: Yes, this update sucks. The answer - use lower case letters, and use alias'.

Posts.EditableText: Hmm, it would help if someone reported this bug to me, preferably via email - I don't seem to have a record of it (I have one about capital letters in status variable names, but not in object names). But if you're a Quest Pro user you can still download v4.03 from the "My Downloads" area at http://www.axeuk.com/mydownloads
